${ModID}:Adaption.NAME: Adaption
${ModID}:Adaption.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack you play costs 0. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Adaption.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next Attack you play costs 0.

${ModID}:Aftermath.NAME: Aftermath
${ModID}:Aftermath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Anchor.NAME: Anchor
${ModID}:Anchor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Heavy_Plating. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Backswing.NAME: Backswing
${ModID}:Backswing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Bide.NAME: Bide
${ModID}:Bide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Heavy_Plating. NL Add a *Wound into your hand.

${ModID}:BlackMist.NAME: Black Mist
${ModID}:BlackMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom and !${ModID}:M2! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BlessedWeapon.NAME: Blessed Weapon
${ModID}:BlessedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have an ${ModID}:Infusion, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Bloodcast.NAME: Bloodcast
${ModID}:Bloodcast.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Wound into your hand. NL Next turn, NL gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@}.

${ModID}:BoxOfSecrets.NAME: Box of Secrets
${ModID}:BoxOfSecrets.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack into your hand for each enemy in combat. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BreatheLife.NAME: Breathe Life
${ModID}:BreatheLife.DESCRIPTION: Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand. NL ${ModID}:Infuse !M! ${ModID}:Might for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CallingCard.NAME: Calling Card
${ModID}:CallingCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Call, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:CallOfTheWild.NAME: Call of the Wild
${ModID}:CallOfTheWild.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call !M! ${ModID}:Centurion card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
${ModID}:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Choose 1 of !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your draw pile to add into your hand.

${ModID}:CloseCombat.NAME: Close Combat
${ModID}:CloseCombat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Concoct.NAME: Concoct
${ModID}:Concoct.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, ${ModID}:Infuse !M! ${ModID}:Toxin.

${ModID}:Connection.NAME: Connection
${ModID}:Connection.DESCRIPTION: Lose all [${ModID}:CenturionIcon] and [${ModID}:MysticIcon] . NL Gain that much [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Connection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all [${ModID}:CenturionIcon] and [${ModID}:MysticIcon] . NL Gain that much [E].

${ModID}:CrackGround.NAME: Crack Ground
${ModID}:CrackGround.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Intimidated to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:CripplingDarts.NAME: Crippling Darts
${ModID}:CripplingDarts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:Crush.NAME: Crush
${ModID}:Crush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you do not have an ${ModID}:Infusion, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
${ModID}:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable for each ${ModID}:Infusion you have.

${ModID}:EnchantingForm.NAME: Enchanting Form
${ModID}:EnchantingForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain an ${ModID}:Infusion, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Enfeeble.NAME: Enfeeble
${ModID}:Enfeeble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FangStrike.NAME: Fang Strike
${ModID}:FangStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Call this card, ${ModID}:Call !M! ${ModID}:Centurion card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:FeatherFall.NAME: Feather Fall
${ModID}:FeatherFall.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times a card is Exhausted, move it into your discard pile.

${ModID}:FieldTactics.NAME: Field Tactics
${ModID}:FieldTactics.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call a ${ModID}:Centurion card. NL ${ModID}:Call a ${ModID}:Mystic card. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:FinalImpact.NAME: Final Impact
${ModID}:FinalImpact.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [${ModID}:CenturionIcon] for each Attack played this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:FollowMe.NAME: Follow Me
${ModID}:FollowMe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Call a card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Foray.NAME: Foray
${ModID}:Foray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Infuse ${ModID}:Might equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:FragileStrike.NAME: Fragile Strike
${ModID}:FragileStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy had Block, Exhaust this.

${ModID}:Harmony.NAME: Harmony
${ModID}:Harmony.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL Whenever this enters your hand, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
${ModID}:Harmony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this enters your hand, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:Hasten.NAME: Hasten
${ModID}:Hasten.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call !M! ${ModID}:Centurion card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 this turn.
${ModID}:Hasten.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call !M! ${ModID}:Centurion card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} and Upgrade {!M!|1=it|@=them}. NL {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 this turn.

${ModID}:HexOfTheFrail.NAME: Hex of the Frail
${ModID}:HexOfTheFrail.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL The next time this target attempts to Block, it instead loses that much HP.

${ModID}:Indefatigable.NAME: Indefatigable
${ModID}:Indefatigable.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@}.

${ModID}:IronHead.NAME: Iron Head
${ModID}:IronHead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Keris.NAME: Keris
${ModID}:Keris.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, deals !M! additional damage.

${ModID}:KillingIntent.NAME: Killing Intent
${ModID}:KillingIntent.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Intimidated to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LesserPolymorph.NAME: Lesser Polymorph
${ModID}:LesserPolymorph.DESCRIPTION: Enemy becomes a Louse. Reverts back in !M! turn{@@}{!M!|>1=s} or when killed. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LethalTorrent.NAME: Lethal Torrent
${ModID}:LethalTorrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each ${ModID}:Infusion you have.

${ModID}:LifeToLifeless.NAME: Life to Lifeless
${ModID}:LifeToLifeless.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they lose HP equal to {@@}{!M!|>1=!M! times }its amount.

${ModID}:MaceCrash.NAME: Mace Crash
${ModID}:MaceCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Parry.NAME: Parry
${ModID}:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if the enemy intends to attack. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Intimidated.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy does not intend to attack.

${ModID}:PileUp.NAME: Pile Up
${ModID}:PileUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage if the enemy does not intend to attack. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PurestSteel.NAME: Purest Steel
${ModID}:PurestSteel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Shed all Attack cards in your hand.

${ModID}:RecklessGuard.NAME: Reckless Guard
${ModID}:RecklessGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Wound into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Sequester.NAME: Sequester
${ModID}:Sequester.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, add a copy of it into your hand.

${ModID}:SheerPower.NAME: Sheer Power
${ModID}:SheerPower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ShieldBoomerang.NAME: Shield Boomerang
${ModID}:ShieldBoomerang.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Slither.NAME: Slither
${ModID}:Slither.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Shed !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} at random.

${ModID}:SnakeBite.NAME: Snake Bite
${ModID}:SnakeBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${ModID}:Venom equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${ModID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: Set the cost of ALL your cards to 1 for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Spectre.NAME: Spectre
${ModID}:Spectre.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Shed your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card ${ModID}:Shed. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Springload.NAME: Springload
${ModID}:Springload.DESCRIPTION: Your next Block gaining card gains !M! additional Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:StandStrong.NAME: Stand Strong
${ModID}:StandStrong.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Shed !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Steadfast.NAME: Steadfast
${ModID}:Steadfast.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! less damage from Attacks this combat.

${ModID}:Strategize.NAME: Strategize
${ModID}:Strategize.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. For each ${ModID}:Centurion or ${ModID}:Mystic card discarded, ${ModID}:Call a card of the other type. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Strategize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. For each ${ModID}:Centurion or ${ModID}:Mystic card discarded, ${ModID}:Call a card of the other type.

${ModID}:TapTheImmaterial.NAME: Tap the Immaterial
${ModID}:TapTheImmaterial.DESCRIPTION: Add Ethereal to all cards in your hand. NL Whenever you Exhaust a card this turn, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:Teamwork.NAME: Teamwork
${ModID}:Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you play a ${ModID}:Centurion or ${ModID}:Mystic card that costs 1 or more, ${ModID}:Call a card of the other type. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TemperedForm.NAME: Tempered Form
${ModID}:TemperedForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TempleWithin.NAME: Temple Within
${ModID}:TempleWithin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Unyielding.NAME: Unyielding
${ModID}:Unyielding.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:VisionsOfSnecko.NAME: Visions of Snecko
${ModID}:VisionsOfSnecko.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand (between 0 and 2). NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WideGuard.NAME: Wide Guard
${ModID}:WideGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:WillBreaker.NAME: Will Breaker
${ModID}:WillBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${ModID}:Intimidated.
